name: Shape Run
description:
Shape Run is a Cutting -Edge platforming masterpiece. Inspired by Geometry Dash, Shape Run's beauty knows no bounds. Play as Shape, and run till your heart tires. Dodge obstacles and escape from the evil monsters invading Shape Land.

The Newest Version was posted on 8/2/2022 at 11:32 pm.

-Note: In the How To Play Screen, you are able to scroll with a mouse button to display more information.

-Note 2: Check back here for updated PCK's . If you find issues in the game, it might've already been solved in newer versions. Please feel free to post any issues in the comments and I will take a look.
